Articles.Content: Hello, my name is Adam, but I like when people call me BOB, I am playing KSP one month now, bought it today (played on DEMO before), yeah, see ya around!

Hi Bob, welcome to the forums, if you need help, gimme a message.

Cheers!

Bio

(P.S First!)

Welcome to the forums!

If you ever get stuck on one of the trickier parts of the game, be sure to check out the Drawing Board (link in my sig). It has a number of tutorials and other materials that might help you get back on track. The people in the How To forums are also prepared to field any questions you might have about what you need to do in order to accomplish your goals.

Happy landings!
